alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Gates of the Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 7:05PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lewis and Clark and west central Cascade Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 704 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northwest of Wolf Creek, or 27 miles west of Cascade, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bowmans Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Gates of the Mountains
